```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(multcomp::cml) +
  aes(
    x = age,
    y = time,
    fill = sex,
    colour = treatment,
    size=5,
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  scale_color_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(vars(treatment))

```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(survival::colon) +
  aes(x = id, y = age, colour = rx) +
  geom_point(size=5) +
  scale_color_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(vars(rx))



```
